Sample items have been added to the lists. Add a next one by swiping left and selecting Add product from menu.
The image attached to the MMS contains the To buy list. Open the image from the MMS with Shopping List application to import.
All the lists and the items will be lost permanently.
You have just added first item! Select it to move it to To buy list or hold it to update it\'s price.
Permissions required to import a list:
